      On the night of 26 January, the Nicole Bridge will purify from snow

      CFC and improvement 0 110

      It is recommended that the Ul. Podgor and Kuznet bridge be used for travel.

      On 25 January, lights will be cut off on several streets in Zalevier

      Society and Life 0 144

      Repair work will be carried out.

      In the Navocs, the caters are willing to quit unless they get paid.

      CFC and improvement 3 410

      There was also a meeting with the RRTIC team, chief of Navolok Vadim Coptev.

      Vahtangowa theatres were visited by the cadets of the Kinesh Children ' s House

      Education and youth 2 166

      The guys looked at the Pitter Pen show, took a few tours.

      In 2023, more than 1,000 inhabitants of the region were sent to the Sanatorium by FIU in Ivanov province

      Society and Life 1 227

      Thirty-one million roubles were sent for this purpose.

      In Zawolzke, four separatial sariums were burned.

      Society and Life 0 244

      Firefighters have not allowed the fire to spread to other structures.

      Marina Orlov, Director of School No.19

      Education and youth 9 1312

      Since 2023, she's been working at the science and technology rector school.

      The young Kineshs competed in the tribe.

      Sport 0 183

      The starters went to the Olympic Championship Athlete.

      In Kinshasa, the winners of the Children ' s Creation Festival, " Christmas present "

      Society and Life 0 318

      Guys got diplomas and sweet presents.

      The winter football tournament continues to be playing in Kinshasa.

      Sport 0 235

      Six teams from Vichugi and Kineshma attend the competition.

      The Kinesh Prosecutor ' s Office refers to security measures to prevent the poisoning of harbour gas PER

      CFC and improvement 0 328

      This applies, inter alia, to the rules for the use of gas appliances.

      Alexander Stepanov and Vladimir Shilov from Ivanov province died in the SVR area

      Society and Life 1 982

      Governor Stanislav Vosresenski expressed his condolences to his native and close heroes.

      On the Vojvods of Boborakin, the plumbing broke.

      CFC and improvement 2 471

      A few streets on Red Wetke remained waterless.

      In Kinshasa, the first project to revive the silo tower in Russia was planned.

      Economy and business 18 3380

      The mill behind the Nicole bridge will be converted to a " natural Mecca " with a restaurant on the elevator.

      Svetlana Skvortsov left the post of Director of School No. 19

      Education and youth 32 4365

      She worked at school for over 35 years.

      In Kineshme, a 66-year-old Anatoly Goodwive disappeared.

      Society and Life 0 995

      Since 20 January, his whereabouts have been unknown.

      The work of the convicted SC-3 won the drawing contest on the Blocade Leningrad

      Society and Life 1 485

      The work of the " East frames " was the best recognized.

      HC Electric Control is inviting fans to play against Grizzly.

      Sport 2 485

      It will be held on 27 January.

info.title: On the night of 26 January, the Nicole Bridge will purify from snow
info.short_text: It is recommended that the Ul. Podgor and Kuznet bridge be used for travel.

info.title: On 25 January, lights will be cut off on several streets in Zalevier
info.short_text: Repair work will be carried out.

info.title: In the Navocs, the caters are willing to quit unless they get paid.
info.short_text: There was also a meeting with the RRTIC team, chief of Navolok Vadim Coptev.

info.title: Vahtangowa theatres were visited by the cadets of the Kinesh Children ' s House
info.short_text: The guys looked at the Pitter Pen show, took a few tours.

info.title: In 2023, more than 1,000 inhabitants of the region were sent to the Sanatorium by FIU in Ivanov province
info.short_text: Thirty-one million roubles were sent for this purpose.

info.title: In Zawolzke, four separatial sariums were burned.
info.short_text: Firefighters have not allowed the fire to spread to other structures.

info.title: Marina Orlov, Director of School No.19
info.short_text: Since 2023, she's been working at the science and technology rector school.

info.title: The young Kineshs competed in the tribe.
info.short_text: The starters went to the Olympic Championship Athlete.

info.title: In Kinshasa, the winners of the Children ' s Creation Festival, " Christmas present "
info.short_text: Guys got diplomas and sweet presents.

info.title: The winter football tournament continues to be playing in Kinshasa.
info.short_text: Six teams from Vichugi and Kineshma attend the competition.

info.title: The Kinesh Prosecutor ' s Office refers to security measures to prevent the poisoning of harbour gas PER
info.short_text: This applies, inter alia, to the rules for the use of gas appliances.

info.title: Alexander Stepanov and Vladimir Shilov from Ivanov province died in the SVR area
info.short_text: Governor Stanislav Vosresenski expressed his condolences to his native and close heroes.

info.title: On the Vojvods of Boborakin, the plumbing broke.
info.short_text: A few streets on Red Wetke remained waterless.

info.title: In Kinshasa, the first project to revive the silo tower in Russia was planned.
info.short_text: The mill behind the Nicole bridge will be converted to a " natural Mecca " with a restaurant on the elevator.

info.title: Svetlana Skvortsov left the post of Director of School No. 19
info.short_text: She worked at school for over 35 years.

info.title: In Kineshme, a 66-year-old Anatoly Goodwive disappeared.
info.short_text: Since 20 January, his whereabouts have been unknown.

info.title: The work of the convicted SC-3 won the drawing contest on the Blocade Leningrad
info.short_text: The work of the " East frames " was the best recognized.

info.title: HC Electric Control is inviting fans to play against Grizzly.
info.short_text: It will be held on 27 January.
